page.title: 15 THE ARTS
page.content: About three or four times a year a concert is held in the Village Hall. There is a stage with lighting and seating for about 200 people.At our School Concert this year we sang songs,recited poems,did a play and a dance/mime and played instruments.Some times a concert party from another village comes to entertain.The Youth Club enjoy their annual concert and Bingo night they run for the elderly. A Mobile Library van tours the area on a Thursday. Journalist Jack Webster has always been drawn back to his roots in the village of Maud,which can be felt in his book A Grain of Truth.A film was made of the roup at the farm where he grew up and was shown on television this year.World famous playwright and novelist Lesley Storm is Maud's most illustrious native
